title: GET_CLOSEST_MAJOR_VEHICLE_NODE
content:
0x2EABE3B06F58C1BE0x04B5F15B// GetClosestMajorVehicleNode
BOOL GET_CLOSEST_MAJOR_VEHICLE_NODE(float x, float y, float z, Vector3* outPosition, float zMeasureMult, int zTolerance);Parameters:x: X coordinatey: Y coordinatez: Z coordinateoutPosition: Pointer to the found nodes coordszMeasureMult: How strongly the difference in the Z direction should be weightedzTolerance: How far apart the Z coords have to be before zMeasureMult kicks inReturns: Returns the closest major vehicle node.Same as GET_CLOSEST_VEHICLE_NODE, but with the node flag GCNF_INCLUDE_SWITCHED_OFF_NODES set.
codeBlocks:
// GetClosestMajorVehicleNode
BOOL GET_CLOSEST_MAJOR_VEHICLE_NODE(float x, float y, float z, Vector3* outPosition, float zMeasureMult, int zTolerance);
